sentences.en: A sense of futility stole over her.
sentences.cn: 她慢慢地产生了一种没用的感觉.

sentences.en: As soon as he had felt these regrets, he realized their futility.
sentences.cn: 一想到这些遗憾, 他就认识到了其中的无效.

sentences.en: At this moment of success I found only an unreasoning sense of futility.
sentences.cn: 在这一成功的时刻我只感到一阵莫名的枉然。

sentences.en: Brown's article tells of the tragedy and futility of war.
sentences.cn: 布朗的文章讲述了战争的悲剧性和无谓性。

sentences.en: Economic theory recognizes the futility of throwing good money after bad.
sentences.cn: 经济理论认为,搭上老本来挽回损失是无益的.

sentences.en: Even in ordinary life you feel the futility of words.
sentences.cn: 即使在日常的生活中你也往往能感受到言辞的无助和无效.

sentences.en: He well knew the futility of trying to contend against witches, so he gave up discouraged.
sentences.cn: 他十分清楚和巫婆斗没什么好处, 于是他垂头丧气,不得不让了步.

sentences.en: Little did they know that these talks were always an exercise in total futility.
sentences.cn: 他们几乎不知道,这种会谈往往都是白费力气,毫无成效.

sentences.en: Shame , compunction, sense of futility flooded his whole being.
sentences.cn: 差耻, 内疾和徒劳的感觉浸满他整个的人.

sentences.en: Solomon saw the futility of seeking satisfaction in people and things.
sentences.cn: 所罗门看出在人与事上找寻满足,乃是缘木求鱼.

sentences.en: Startled , she looked up and met gray eyes that were bitter and full of tired futility.
sentences.cn: 思嘉吃了一惊,抬起头来, 看见一双灰眼睛充满了痛苦和无可奈何的神情.

sentences.en: The atmosphere is saturated with disaster, frustration, futility.
sentences.cn: 四周的气氛中弥漫着灾难 、 挫折和徒劳无功.

sentences.en: The sheer futility of it all exasperates her.
sentences.cn: 它毫无用处，这让她很生气。

sentences.en: Then, who is holding the futility record of NBA?
sentences.cn: 那么, 是哪支球队保持着这个连败纪录?

sentences.en: There was a silence of futility and irritation in the room.
sentences.cn: 屋子里安静极了,充满了徒劳无益和愤怒.

sentences.en: Work is the way that people seek to redeem their lives from futility.
sentences.cn: 工作可以避免人们虚度生命。

words.tran_cn: 无用的；无效的；没有出息的；琐细的；不重要的

trans.tran_cn: 无益，无效，无益的事，无效果的行动
trans.tran_en: Futility is a total lack of purpose or usefulness
